description: Test cases for user authentication including login and registration

test_cases.name: Successful Login with Valid Credentials
steps: Enter valid email address in email field
Enter valid password in password field
test_cases.expected_result: User is redirected to Home screen showing nearby sessions

test_cases.name: Login with Invalid Email Format
test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed indicating invalid email format

test_cases.name: Login with Empty Credentials
test_cases.expected_result: Validation error displayed for required fields

test_cases.name: Login with Incorrect Password
test_cases.expected_result: Error message displayed indicating incorrect credentials

test_cases.name: Navigate to Registration from Login
test_cases.expected_result: User is navigated to registration screen

test_cases.name: Forgot Password Navigation
test_cases.expected_result: User is navigated to password recovery screen

test_cases.name: Successful User Registration
test_cases.expected_result: Account created, user redirected to Home screen

test_cases.name: Registration with Mismatched Passwords
steps: Enter different password in confirm field
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating passwords do not match

test_cases.name: Registration with Existing Email
steps: Enter email that is already registered
test_cases.expected_result: Error message indicating email already exists

test_cases.name: Navigate Back from Registration to Login
test_cases.expected_result: User is navigated back to login screen

test_cases.name: User Logout
test_cases.expected_result: User session ended, redirected to login screen
